lead_paragraph: State-run news outlets said Jiang Tianyong, a disbarred lawyer who has energetically supported the families of human rights lawyers caught in a crackdown, was being held.

headline.main: Chinese Activist, Missing for Weeks, Is Said to Be in Custody

snippet: State-run news outlets said Jiang Tianyong, a disbarred lawyer who has energetically supported the families of human rights lawyers caught in a crackdown, was being held....
